item.title: Hands-On: Avowed feels like Obsidian’s take on Elder Scrolls and we can’t wait to play more - Video Games Chronicle
item.description:
1. Hands-On: Avowed feels like Obsidian’s take on Elder Scrolls and we can’t wait to play more  Video Games Chronicle
  2. Avowed: The Final Preview  IGN
  3. Avowed is a thoroughly old-fashioned RPG adventure, but after the disappointments of Dragon Age: The Veilguard and Starfield, that might be exactly what we need  PC Gamer
  4. Avowed's rickety combat feels like the undoing of its lush fungal world  Rock Paper Shotgun
  5. Obsidian’s Avowed is the cure for “Souls-like” action-RPG fatigue  Ars Technica
